statements: DELETE FROM product_inventory WHERE product_name = 'Sample Product';

DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_quantity < 10 OR reorder_level > 20;

DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 100 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
